#Text=FIFA World Cup 2018
#Text=day six : Japan , Senegal , Russia win three points
#Text=Wednesday , June 20 , 2018
#Text=Yesterday , day six of the 2018 FIFA footall World Cup , Japan defeated Colombia 2 – 1 , Poland lost 1 – 2 against Senegal , and hosts Russia won 3 – 1 against Egypt .
#Text=Group H — Colombia 1 – 2 Japan
#Text=Colombia faced Japan in the first match of Group H at the Mordovia Arena in Saransk .
#Text=Japan had greater ball possession in the match .
#Text=In the 3rd minute of the match , Carlos Sánchez Moreno was sent off after he received a red card for a handball in the penalty area .
#Text=Referee Damir Skomina awarded Japan a penalty kick and Shinji Kagawa scored from the penalty kick , giving Japan an early lead .
#Text=In the 39th minute , Colombia won a free kick and Juan Quintero scored the free kick , equalising for Colombia .
#Text=The first half ended with 1 – 1 on the scoreboard .
#Text=Colombian goalkeeper David Ospina saved an attempt by Takashi Inui in the 57th minute .
#Text=Japan had multiple attempts on goal , and in the 73rd minute , Yuya Osako scored a close-range header from Keisuke Honda 's assist , putting Japan in the lead .
#Text=In the 78th minute , James Rodríguez 's attempt to equalise for Colombia was blocked .
#Text=Osako 's goal turned out to be the match-winning goal for Japan as the final time score was 2 – 1 .
#Text=This victory meant Japan became the first Asian country to defeat a South American nation at the FIFA World Cup .
#Text=After the match , Japan 's coach Akira Nishino said , " Our players were aggressive from the start and that worked very well for us .
